      • trackerKlt

        public static SimpleTrackerPoints trackerKlt(PkltConfig config,
                             ConfigGeneralDetector configExtract,
                             ImageDataType imageType)
        Creates a KLT point tracker
        Parameters:
        config - Configuration for KLT tracker. If null defaults will be used.
        configExtract - Configuration for corner detector. If null defaults will be used.
        imageType - Image type which is processed. F32 or U8
        Returns:
        Point tracker
        See Also:
        PointTracker, PyramidKltTracker
